Header: News1st-Sirasa-Shakthi initiate programme to elect a clean candidate – ‘Think’ commences in Kataragama
Content: The all-island programmme organised by News1st – Sirasa – Shakthi and Caffe named ‘Think’ began a short while ago from Kataragama to educate people to vote for a clean candidate. ‪ This programme is also active in the Nothern Province
